name: firstDay2122
description: Students' first day of school, fall of 2021-2022 school year

name: enrollment2021
description: Total PK-12 enrollment during 2020-2021 school year, from IDOE

name: maskMandate
description: Whether the corporation has had a student mask mandate at any point in the 2021-2022 school year

name: maskMandateDate
description: The earliest date of student mask mandate in the 2021-2022 school year. If the mandate was enacted prior to the school year, the date might be set to 2021-07-01

name: virtual
description: Whether any school in the district has gone to virtual schooling in the 2021-2022 school year

name: virtualDate
description: The earliest date of virtual schooling in the 2021-2022 school year

name: vote16Trump
description: Republicans' share of two-party presidential vote in 2016, calculated from precinct-level data from the Voting and Election Science Team, and 2010 Census Block statistics

name: acsSchPub
description: Total PK-12 public school enrollment, ACS 2019 5-year estimates

name: acsSchPrv
description: Total PK-12 private school enrollment, ACS 2019 5-year estimates

name: acsBlackNonHisp
description: Black or African American non-Hispanic population, ACS 2019 5-year estimates

name: acsHispanic
description: Hispanic or Latino population, ACS 2019 5-year estimates

name: acsBAorMore
description: Percent of 25 and older population with a bachelor's degree or higher
